WorkItem.Description:
Using 2.2.14, I created a new file for an experiment, and after the experiment, deleted the file.  Upon accidentally clicking this now-missing file in the recently used list on the 'File' menu, I get a nasty 'Unhandled Exception' error, and the item stays in the recent list.  Details includes 'System.IO.FileNotFoundException'.
 
The item should be disappearing from that list, probably with an appropriate message box.
 
I was able to get rid of the item only by seeking out and editing my user.config.

Comments.Message: Confirming issue, this happens to me when I occasionally click old files that are no longer there by accident.
